You know

(clutching the ankh, looking  at Jessica's; then:) I don't have much time.

No - just there - on the first level. (beat) Don't look for us. We'll see you. You don't seem quite sure, Jessica. (beat) Can you do it? Will you?
Slowly, Jessica nods.
Tonight? Y-yes...if I can find him.

Jessica faces her squarely, nods. The woman looks deeply eyes, relaxes.

Walking along a handsomely landscaped stream. Laughing to stopping to admire the beautiful fish (koi).

Maybe they're angry because they're grown in meccano-breeders. grimacing)  Instead of what? Nine months inside a  woman: (ugh)  We're all raised the same but most of  us don't become cubs in Cathedral.

Insane. Nurseries are better than any  mother could be.

text: Arcade shining like distant fireworks.

Below them a narrow, sharply angled concrete canyon, butt walls rising featureless. The look of an old fortress, bl and cool. Still visible over an opening the chiseled lege "Cathedral Plaza--2025 A.D.--Skidmore, Rosenfelt, Hennesy architects." Jessica shivers, looking around her. Quickly now--
He helps her through the narrow opening--the portal's wal thick.. They turn abruptly and see:

The zigzag, angled effect crea absolute confusion of images. but Logan leads her unhesit across the chamber to the corridor. Jessica hangs back, m certain she's about to smash into something. Just follow--no matter how it seems... best) But what is this--why? the corridor)         The Cubs. When they're flying on muscle  there's  no way to catch up. Fourteen? Fifteen? Your days are running  out. How long can you last? A year. Six  months? (he points to the yellow flower in Billy's palm) What happens when you're sixteen and you go green? moving a drugpad against Logan's face. Logan is holding his breath...desperately trying not to b "Muscle" directly from the pad into his system. He's trying to hold his breath...

watching

hysteria) There's been a terrible error! My Lifeclock must have broken in some way! (rising tone) I'm nowhere near thirty...look at me...I'm twenty-two. I should be green! Did you hear me? (shouting) Green! Don't be afraid--

Hello.

who is playing the console as he speaks.
